DEPENDENCE SYMPTOMS


The next questions are about some problems you may have had because of smoking/using tobacco.

 
INTERVIEWER: If they report both smoking and smokeless tobacco use, record symptoms for most severe.
Was there ever a time when you often wanted to (smoke/use tobacco) so badly that you couldn't stop yourself from (having a cigarette, cigar, or pipe / using)
Did you find it difficult to think of anything else?
Over time did you become so used to tobacco that you were able to smoke without getting sick to your stomach or without feeling grouchy or restless?
Did you ever have times when you purposely stopped, cut down, or went without (smoking /tobacco)?
How old were you the first time?
How many times did you try to cut down or quit?
How many times did you try to cut down or quit and found that you could not?

People who cut down or stop smoking after smoking regularly for some time may not feel well. During these times, did you ever feel really tired, or have headaches, problems going to the bathroom, upset stomach, weakness or trouble sleeping?
During these times, did you ever have emotional problems like feeling irritable, nervous, restless, depressed or have trouble concentrating?
Did you ever have times when you (smoked/used tobacco) to keep from having problems like these?
Did you have times when you (smoked/used tobacco) even though you promised yourself that you wouldn't?
Were there ever times when you (smoked/used tobacco) more often or for more days in a row than you planned?
Were there times when you tried to stop or cut down on your (smoking/tobacco use) and found that you were not able to?
Did you ever have times when you chain-smoked, that is, started another cigarette as soon as you finished one?
Did you ever have a time when you gave up or cut down on important activities - like sports or hanging out with friends and family - so you could (smoke/use tobacco)?
Did tobacco ever cause you any physical problems like coughing, difficulty breathing, lung trouble, or problems with your heart or blood pressure?
Did you continue to (smoked/use tobacco) even though you had these problems?
Did tobacco ever cause you any emotional problems like irritability, nervousness, restlessness, difficulty concentrating, or feeling sad?
Did you continue to (smoked/use tobacco) even though you had these emotional problems?
